history.text: The Avengers was rated highly on Rotten Tomatoes so it must be good.
I think the avengers movie isn't the best of marvel's movies myself but i do love thor and loki and can't forget ironman
Yeah Robert Downey Jr. plays Iron Man really well
I also enjoy Chris Evans as Captain America
oh yes there is no other to be able to play ironman better
yes he is really good i miss him as johnny storm as well though
and chris hemsworth makes a great thor
My favorite is the Hulk though. I really want there to be a standalone Hulk movie. Mark Ruffalo is amazing
I am not the biggest fan of Thor, however, the most recent Thor movie was great
yeah i think they should try another hulk movie cause mark ruffalo is the better hulk
Yeah he is
I can't remember the main villain in the Avengers
yeah i loved the newest movie of thor. i however am not a fan of black widow at all and find that avengers falls mroe flat with her and hawkeye
I actually like Hawkeye but I am not a fan of Black Widow. She's a bit boring
i can't remember either i think it changes
yeah she is boring lol
im also not a fan of nick fury and the whole s.h.i.e.l.d.
yeah same
The Marvel movies are also a bit confusing to me. Way too much happens haha
i do think there is enough fans of the avengers or at least one superhero or another from it to keep the franchise going though
yeah some of them can be very confusing
oh yeah the whole Marvel universe is extremely popular
Even though I am not the biggest fan, I usually always watch them
it definitely can find something for everyone to love one way or another
to me its a hit or miss some of their movies are great others like the avengers isnt always my favorite
yeah, but Josh Whedon is a great directorr
yes that he is he knows how to get people to tune in to the next movie lol
So are the Avengers part of S.H.I.E.L.D. or is S.H.I.E.L.D. bad?
rotten tomatos at 92% is a great acheivement even for the ones like me who don't much care for the avengers. it gets them more notice
I remember Samuel L. Jackson as Nick Fury but I don't remember if he was a bad guy
its weird i don't think they are technically part of shield jsut work with them
oh ok so SHIELD is good. gotcha haha
he is a good guy if i remember right but still shield is a pain
yeah 92% is very high, however I think the other Avengers movies got rated lower
